name: Crying Leviathans
description:
Explore the depths of a mysterious lake, one desperate fellow at a time. The goal is to piece out the secrets of the story by exploring and uncoverthe mysteries of the abyss. But you may be not alone down there.

Use ZQSD and Shift and Space to move in the dark. Space to pass dialogue. Mouse and click in menus. We suggest to take notes !

dav: GameDesign, SoundDesign  https://davplaysound.itch.io/
Zornithorinque: GameDesign, Programming https://zornithorinque.itch.io/
SK: Monster Art
